title: The Dark Wizard of Hogwarts - Novel Updates
tags: Dark   Fanfiction   Magic   Magical Girls   Male Protagonist   Orphans   Transmigration
author: 一震秋风
description:
Reborn into the wizarding world of Harry Potter and become a member of Ravenclaw.

By coincidence, he was forced to learn black magic.

There’s nothing wrong with black magic!

The power is great, the effect is peculiar, and it is not difficult to learn. As long as… can resist the temptation of the devil!

Well, I believe I will be able to resist!>
